name: Medianizer
description: Medianizer contract used by FA, instead of alternatively linking Median as an external library.

functionDecorators.name: calculate
functionDecorators.description: Returns the sorted middle, or the average of the two middle indexed items if the array has an even number of elements. Uses calculateInplace because args are copied in memory when called.

parameterDecorators.name: list
parameterDecorators.description: The list of elements to pull the median from.
